text:
@Huawei How's the 5G for the million Uighurs your CCP are locking up? 
What about Tibet, is that a country you are rolling 5G out to or a country you rolled tanks into? Huawei is an arm of the State, if coronavirus has taught us one thing it is not to trust the CCP or Winnie the Pooh-Mao

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
